newsitem.title: NIGERIA: SOCCER-NIGERIA QUALIFY FOR WORLD CUP FINALS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-NIGERIA QUALIFY FOR WORLD CUP FINALS.

text.p: Nigeria became the first country to qualify for next year's World Cup finals in France when they beat Kenya 3-0 on Saturday.
Nigerian midfielder Sunday Oliseh opened the scoring in the 12th minute and Emmanuel Amuneke hit the second goal two minutes before halftime.
Wilson Oruma sealed Kenya's fate in the 81st minute to carry Nigeria to an unassailable lead at the top of their African qualifying group.
Nigeria qualified for their second consecutive finals after reaching the second round of the tournament in 1994 before they were eliminated by Italy.
